name: Jellow AAC Communicator
aliases: Jellow Basic, AAC, Learning to Speak
description: Jellow Basic Communicator is a freely downloadable friendly Augmentative and Alternative Communication (AAC) system that uses icons/images to enable aid communication in people learning to speak or with difficulty with speech and language.

SDGs.evidenceText: Jellow Basic is freely, downloadable mobile, web application to help children with speech difficulty to learn to speak.
